meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sandra Gore Ron Cratty Alice Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #752.

td.p: Sandra Gore, a researcher originally from Boston, Massachusetts
Ron Cratty, a pastor from Claremont, California
Alice Cohen, a labratory technician from Port Washington, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $14,301)

tr.td: JAPAN
FACTS & FIGURES
FARMING
MUSICALS
NAME CHANGES
SAINTS
